about_the_game:
Explore a two-sided temple of light and dark for RPG Maker! With the Sun and Moon Palace, create a dungeon with a fun flip side…just swap the tileset for an instant shift in mood!

The Sun and Moon Palace Tileset Includes (in dark and light themes):

Ground Tiles:

Water tiles and waterfalls
Grass, dirt and bush tiles
Concrete (plain and colored)
Two types of colored tiles (Note, sun set includes blue/orange variations and moon includes purple/green variations)
Two types of neutral tiles
and more!

Walls:

Various styles of plain walls, plus three decorative walls! Also includes flat roof and roof edge.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
arches and pillars in several sizes
themed lighting (geometric suns and crystal-orb moons)
doors and window curtains (includes animated curtain to use for doorways)
Stained glass, lit and unlit, in several sizes
Decorative moon and sun (several sizes)
Altar, with and without sun/moon
decorative runes
random decorations, portraits, houseplants, etc
Themed beds, thrones, chairs, dressers, bookshelves, fireplaces etc. Where appropriate, there are two colors of furniture for each set.
Large themed mirrors
Hanging decorations with adjustable chains
Woman statue with sun/moon
Themed rugs
plus more!

Events and Animations

Includes:

yellow and blue fire to use with fireplaces or torches
matching treasure chests with opening animation
curtain animation for windows or doors
themed fountain with running water


UPDATE January 2025:

* Art updates, bugfixes


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
